name: Submarine Slice
description:
Created for the "GDQ One Mechanic Game Jam 8"

One Mechanic: "HEFLS" (high end future laser slicer)

Theme: Recycle

Draw cutter boxes with your mouse. Try to find all the valuable tech inside the submarine but beware of the explosive cargo!!

We teamed up and created our own art and music for this gamejam project. 

The project runs in unity. We utilized Aseprite and Cubase.
